name: Sonic Colors Dating Simulator
description:
WARNING! THIS GAME HAS MURDER AND NAUGHTY WORDS! GAMER DISCRETION IS ADVISED

What is Sonic Colors Dating Simulator?

Welcome to the fantastic world of Sonic Colors! Sonic was going about his day in the Greenhill zone when all his friends began accosting him! They keep asking him to partake in social outings! Oh, the humanity! Will Sonic go on a 'date' with one of his friends or will he be sad and alone forever? Find out in, Sonic Colors Dating Simulator!

Datable Characters

Amy

Tails

Eggman

Walter

PS

Sonic was also cursed! He turns into the WEREHOG after the sun sets. You must gain enough love with the person you're dating otherwise you'll kill them when you turn into the WEREHOG! Good luck. :D <3
